issue.title: Python: Write Parquet files to pyarrow.io.NativeFile objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-389](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-389). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `pyarrow.parquet.write_table` only supports strings as filename arguments and thus can only store files locally. The implementation should match the behaviour of `pyarrow.parquet.read_table`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-389?focusedCommentId=15715611) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 214
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/214>
